title:
On extremal problems of Delsarte type for positive definite functions on
  LCA groups
authors: Elena E. Berdysheva, Mita D. Ramabulana and Szil\'ard Gy. R\'ev\'esz
abstract:
A unifying framework for some extremal problems on locally compact Abelian
groups is considered, special cases of which include the Delsarte and Tur\'an
extremal problems. A slight variation of the extremal problem is introduced and
the different formulations are studied for equivalence. Extending previous
work, a general result on existence of extremal functions for the new variant
is proved under a certain general topological condition.
